content: (o! Mariyaame nyaan thottakkaaran thanne ... Enna pole)

Apreme! Parishu-ddhaa! Siddhaa
Nin keertthikallaar va-rnnicheedum?
Mushkkerum markkee-yaan maanee-
Bardaisonenni-vare dushdan
/tninnodu-poraadaan vanchana-yaaletti
/tthottaa-poringkal kshamayodu-neeyetta
Ghorapareekshakalle-ntentayyo!
Varnnicheedaane-lluthallaarkkum.

Thevodorose!-bhaagyam the
Shuddhanmaare svargamanaallan
Thoshippikkaan cher-ttha virunnil
Vanneedumpolla-varodoppam
/tninne-edangkal modi-ppicheedum
/tnee kalpana kaatthu; daiveshdam cheythu.
Bhaagyam priya kartthaa-vil ninnum
Paaram siddhicho-ne! Bhaagyam!
